channel.title: NEW ProScape C5+Combat-X || PVP & PK || Great Customs!
channel.description:
[center][b]Hey guys this is a great RSPS (Cache and Client folders) you should really check it out these guys i know IxPRO Clan took the Combat-X v9 server and combined it with their ProScape C5 and its great! Run the file in the base folder first then if it doesn't work open the "run" file in the client folder as a backup and it should work!! [size=14pt]IF YOU USE CLIENT TO MAKE A SERVER PLEASE GIVE A LITTLE CREDIT TO IXPRO CLAN AND/OR COMBAT-X![/size]
Features:
- 100% Money Pouch (Just Combat-X) - No Dupes + Cheat engine/cheat clients Blocked (ProScape C5 and Combat-X) - Server Announcment upon 99 with spins awarded for SOF (Just Combat-X) - Lottery System With Staff Disabled from entering draw (Just Combat-X) - Custom Login Messages, for staff or certain players (ProScape C5 and Combat-X) - Total level with 120 dung (Just ProScape C5) - Squeal of fortune with eventhandling (ProScape C5 and Combat-X) - Staff tab with online status showing (ProScape C5 and Combat-X) - 24 Skills all working, With advanced Methods (ProScape C5 and Combat-X) - Loyalty shop with 100 points/hour and titles,pets,armour etc - Perfect switching (Just ProScape C5) - Anti lag 100% fullscreen with all orbs (ProScape C5 and Combat-X) - Brand new teleportation sidebar interfaces (Just Combat-X) - Fixed all crown and donator issues (ProScape C5 and Combat-X) - UID system, allowing custom clients to connect! (Just ProScape C5) - Super Donator with features (Just Combat-X) - Milestone System with complectionist cape+emote (Just Combat-X) - New bosses and minigames (ProScape C5 and Combat-X) - Npc,Player,tile and projectile clipping (Just ProScape C5) - Summoning creating pouch infusing and summoning (Just Combat-X) - New skillcape shop, interface with pictures (ProScape C5 and Combat-X) - Perfect agility arena, With awards and points (Just Combat-X) - Ticket exchange, turn 2b into a check (Just ProScape C5) - Xp lamp available from squeal(Multiclick enabled) - Npc facing allowing npcs to direction/walk (ProScape C5 and Combat-X) - X bones on alter (Just Combat-X) - Disabled looping items upon purchase (Just Combat-X) - Lodestones (ProScape C5 and Combat-X) - 317 maps readded for v4, with exeption of 718 nex's (Just Combat-X) - Fully working nex with followers and specials (Just ProScape C5) - New items Ganodermic, polypore etc (Just Combat-X) - Teleport tab teleport spells light up (Just ProScape C5) - Welcome screen thanks to alero (Just Combat-X) - Pest control with boat ride from port sarim (ProScape C5 and Combat-X) - 718 bandos and torva models (ProScape C5 and Combat-X) - Jailed if you have dung items outside dung (ProScape C5 and Combat-X) - All new emotes in tab work (Just Combat-X) - x2 Xp ring added to loyalty shop (ProScape C5 and Combat-X) - Lunar isle maps with banking there and objects (Just ProScape C5) - Ragefire, steadfast and glaiven boots (Just ProScape C5) - Clipped firemaking and ash dropping (Just Combat-X) - New point handling via interface (ProScape C5 and Combat-X) - Nudolion with guide how to make super/overloads (Just Combat-X) - Brand new item pricing (ProScape C5 and Combat-X) - New home in rimmington (Just ProScape C5) - Custom rimmington bank (Just Combat-X) - Working draining auras with wings (Just Combat-X) - Bank pins and bank searching (ProScape C5 and Combat-X) - Construction portal at home with shop (ProScape C5 and Combat-X) - New runescape context menu's (Just ProScape C5) - Dwarf multi cannon(fix firing)(Just Combat-X) - Two worlds with world switching (ProScape C5 and Combat-X) - Fixed all pets including dogs and cats (ProScape C5 and Combat-X) - New monster teleporting interfaces (Just Combat-X) - Automatic username&password saving (ProScape C5 and Combat-X) - Good starting inventory (Just ProScape C5) - No server connection issues (Just ProScape C5) - Stable system (Just ProScape C5) - Renamed and enhanced worlds (Just ProScape C5)
VIRUS SCAN! : [url=http://icap.me/i/251fe04456.png]http://icap.me/i/251fe04456.png[/url]
[size=12pt]PICTURES:[/size] [img]http://i1140.photobucket.com/albums/n573/NBSxToXiiCPwNg/bWZazi9_zpsee8afbff.png[/img] [img]http://i1140.photobucket.com/albums/n573/NBSxToXiiCPwNg/YloJqNA_zpsfb78d0f9.png[/img] [img]http://i1140.photobucket.com/albums/n573/NBSxToXiiCPwNg/jxZOgv6_zps20009017.jpg[/img]
Client/Cache (.RAR) Link: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/f6gmq96wvcb3bbf/Combat-X%2BProScape_C5.rar]Click to Download[/url] Open the linked file in the base folder first and if it doesn't work and you get an error then go to the client folder and open the "run" file in there and it should work as a backup.
[hr] Credit 58% Combat-X/hack3r Credit 42% ProScape C5/IXPRO CLAN[/b][/center]
